desc: EM-Bench is a moment method antenna design and simulation program . It compares well with other design programs such as Wiple-d, FEKO, EZNEC and many others

layout.text: EM-Bench was created by Phoenix Antenna Systems Ltd. to provide a set of tools for the design and simulation of antennas and related products such as coaxial transmission line, strip line and microstrip transmission line design as well as interference models, using the electromagnetic moment method. The first product to be introduced is ANSim, an antenna simulation and modelling program
